comment: A subclass condition on the members of two indexed classes ` C ( x ) ` and ` D ( y ) ` that implies a subclass relation on their indexed unions. Generalization of Proposition 8.6 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 59. Compare ~ uniss2 . (Contributed by NM, 9-Dec-2004.)
